title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, November 8, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss informs his wife that the army is on the move again. He relates news of Northern opinion, election, and Southern sympathizers.
keywords: Troop Movement, National Government, Patriotism, Military Authority, Church/Religious Activity, African Americans, Slavery, Women, Family, American Civil War
